E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/29/1989
Subject: Frank Allen is sick...
Diagnosis: Sinus Infection Nose.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Eugene Starke
Dear Sir,
Eugene Starke has an AVG of .349 at AA Plymouth Argyles!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Richard Miskell
Dear Sir,
Richard Miskell isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Plymouth Argyles!
He has an AVG of .223, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Tom Straight
Dear Sir,
Tom Straight shouldn't play at AA Plymouth Argyles!
He has an AVG of .182 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/2/1989
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Keith Cobos



Date: Monday, 5/19/1989
Subject: Progress of Douglas Wilson
Dear Sir,
Douglas Wilson has an ERA of 2.57 at A Yeovil Glovers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Andrew Seiter

James Largo
